name: Hyaku no Sekai no Monogatari: The Tales on a Watery Wilderness
summary: This Famicom title by ASK combines the mechanics of a tabletop board game with the battle style and character progression of a role-playing game to create an interesting hybrid. One to two players can embark on a great adventure to explore the realm of Yukiria and complete quests for its inhabitants, with multiple endings possible!
